original_title: These surprising materials are the future of furniture design | CNN
article_summary: "Design firms are revolutionizing home and living industries with sustainable furniture and materials, such as repurposed textiles and denim, 3D-printed candle holders, and rubber accessories from sneaker soles. The circular home market is projected to reach €45 billion by 2030, driven by demand for eco-friendly products. Designers like Davide Balda and The New Raw are focusing on reducing textile waste and creating sustainable materials for a more eco-friendly future."</s>
